function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of optimization algorithm in building occupant distribution","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread due to suboptimal occupant distribution","Mitigation":"Perform sensitivity analysis to account for disease spread patterns and prioritize minimizing close contact","Technologies":"Simulation models to assess disease spread and optimize occupant distribution","People":"Building occupants, especially in high-occupancy environments","Owner":"Building managers, architects, and optimization algorithm developers"}]}
